title: Tag Search (Archived)
content:
Below is a function to allow you to search articles using multiple tags via a dropdown list. 
 You can find a simple user's guide to tags at [[[a-laymen-s-guide-to-tagging|this page]]]. The extensive lists of tags can also be found [https://05command.wikidot.com/tech-hub-tag-list here].

[[iframe https://home.helenbot.com/tools/tagSearch.php style="border: 0;" width="100%" height="800"]]

[[size 70%]] Developed by [[*user DrMagnus]], hosted by [https://home.helenbot.com/index.html HelenBot] [[/size]]
author: Crayne
